channel.title: Error whenever i attack npc disconnect (Original Delta Source)
channel.description: Hey i wanted to use themost basic delta source so of course i download that Whenever i attack an npc i get this java.lang.NullPointerException at client.followDirection(client.java:2340) at client.process(client.java:15130) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:271) at process.run(process.java:23) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) And i get disconnected Please tell me why this happens XD
